Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to provide required documentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Application of misrepresentation under IRPA s.40(1)(a)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's claims found not credible due to lack of verifiable documentation
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Brokerage company records, applicant's financial statements
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Withholding material facts regarding financial transactions
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inability to verify source of funds
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative decision subject to judicial review
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation inducing error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Manager erred in applying s.40(1)(a)
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Applicant's inability to verify financial sources
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant's credibility undermined by lack of documentation
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to Manager's interpretation of misrepresentation
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Compliance with procedural fairness in administrative decision-making
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose or verify financial information

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Application of misrepresentation under IRPA s.40(1)(a)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's statements contradicted by third-party evidence
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Brokerage company denial of accounts, applicant's financial claims
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misrepresentation of material fact (source of funds)
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Contradiction between applicantâ€™s claims and third-party records
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative decision subject to judicial review
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation inducing error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Application_Factor: False or unverifiable representation of financial sources
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Manager erred in applying s.40(1)(a)
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspected misrepresentation regarding source of funds
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of corroboration from financial institution
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Not directly alleged, but failure to substantiate documents
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant's credibility challenged due to inconsistent information
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adherence to procedural fairness in assessment
Crimes.Omission_Type: Withholding or failing to verify material financial information
